data.title: Suzanne King
data.meta_description: Suzanne joined NEA in 1995 and is the Partner in charge of LP relations and marketing activities. In this role, she has coordinated raising $11.6 billion for NEA funds 12 through 15 and the NEA 15 Opportunity Fund. Suzanne started her career at NEA on the information technology investing team and worked with many portfolio companies including Guardent (acquired by Verisign), and Quantum Bridge Communications (acquired by Motorola). Prior to NEA, Suzanne led the financial team at XcelleNet, a venture-backed developer of system management software for remote access.

Check whether your company is in the KANDO database by typing its name in the search box

1 of 8

Add your company

If your company is not in the database, create an account and, once logged in, add it by selecting "Add" > "Add company" in order to create a profile.

2 of 8

Add your company

If your company is not in the database, you can add it by selecting "Add" > "Add company" in order to create a profile. (You need to be logged in to do this.)

3 of 8

Find investors

After you have created your company profile, click on the "Find investors" button to generate a list of investors for it.

4 of 8

Find investors

Open the company profile which you have created, and click on the "Find investors" button under the logo to generate a list of investors for it.

5 of 8

Find investors

Open the company profile, and click on the "Find investors" button under the logo to generate a list of investors for it.

6 of 8

See the investor list

Once our AI has generated your investor list, click on "My projects" to see it.
